message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the product you're selling. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $130.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Would you consider $125 for the product?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go.
I see you've reached your minimum price, which is reasonable. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
